item.name: Authentication
Login

request.description: Authenticates the user and returns the user's API token.

item.name: Logout

request.description: Logouts the user and removes the API key.

item.name: Update the specified resource in storage.
Managing Tickets
Get All Tickets

query.description: Sort the tickets by a specific field(s). Separate by comma. Denote desc with a minus sign.
Filter tickets by status code: A, C, H, X. Separate by comma.
Filter tickets by title. Wildcard supported.
Filter tickets by creation date. Can be a single date or a range separated by comma.
Filter tickets by update date. Can be a single date or a range separated by comma.

item.name: Store a Ticket

request.description: Stores a new ticket. Users can only create tickets for themselves. Managers can create tickets for any user.
